item.title: PyCharm autocomplete setup for MotionBuilder scripting
item.description: PyCharm, a popular Python IDE, can greatly enhance your scripting experience in MotionBuilder. This tutorial will guide you through the process of configuring PyCharm for MotionBuilder scripting, enabling autocompletion feature to streamline your development workflow.
